item.title: Play PlayStation Games on Android
item.author: dave@bennettnotes.com (Dave Bennett)
item.description: {{ youtube UA9WCJO6X44 {} Do you miss the good old PlayStation days? I am talking about the original PlayStation with the 1MB MemoryÂ cards (I had a lot of those) and the boring yet simplistic outer-body design? If so, there is hope for you. Thanks to multiple apps in the Play Store, you can play PlayStation games on Android. [adinserter block=”5″] Emulation has come so far on Android. It amazes me at just how many titles are compatible with the PlayStation emulators.
